title: Sports in the Time of Coronavirus - Baseball Season Begins & The Washington Football Team Is Born
itunes:title: Sports in the Time of Coronavirus - Baseball Season Begins & The Washington Football Team Is Born
description:
L.A. Clippers player Lou Williams is quarantined after visiting a strip club, the Washington Football Team rebrands, and MLB adds fake crowd noise to its broadcasts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
